Name: Kayden Mimmack
Details:
- Start/end date flexible
- Fully furnished
- 30 second walk to Dunkin' Donuts-combination-convenience store
- 10 minute walk to Stop n Shop, Whole Foods
- 5 minute walk to 94/80 bus line
- Full kitchen and bath, all utensils / pots / pans included, has dishwasher
- 2 balconies
- House shared with 2 other people

Name: Shunta Muto
Details:
- Start/end date is negotiable
- Full kitchen and bath
- Kitchen has microwave, big fridge/freezer, oven, dishwasher, rice cooker, toaster, electric pot, and more than enough silverware + dishes + pots/pans
- Big living room and dining room
- Clean basement for storage and laundry (and party)
- Utility ~$35/month (gas+electric+internet, based on last summer)
- 10 min walk to campus, close to gym 
- 1 min walk to a convenience store (http://alexandersfood.com/)

Name: Marlene Jordana
Details: Large room, great balcony, full kitchen and bath, kitchen has a microwave toaster stove and oven with your own shelf in the fridge, laundry is FREE, utilities not included

Name: Klielle Glanzberg-Krainin, Jared Lieberman
Details: Rooms available for the summer - recently new front porches on all levels, refinished floors, new drywall and paint

Name: Sequoia Scavullo
Details: Lovely room with windows that show both sunrise and sunset. Near the fenway and easy to acess all of Boston.  AVAILABLE NOW! email me for more details.

Name: Connor Doherty
Details: fully furnished 3 person apartment, 1-3 persons welcome to contact me. wonderful spacious house. free street parking, wonderful porches, all kitchen equipment available, washer, drier, hardwood floors.

Name: Allison Kannam
Details: 1 room in a great 3 bedroom, email for more info!

Name: Paul Chiarawongse
Details:
Location: 5-minute walk to campus, 5 minute walk to Teele Sq. liquor store and convenience store.
One bedroom available, with kitchen, huge common area in the basement + on the first floor, and two bathrooms (shared with three other ppl), Laundry is located right next door.
Rent is 800 a month (utilities not included). Message me for pictures or if you want to see the house! Available June 1 - Aug 31

Name: Zack Loewenstein
Details: 1 room available. Some furniture. 3 housemates during academic year (2 girls 1 guy). Big kitchen w/ dishwasher, gas stove, & granite counters. Close to DPH/Tamper. Around the corner from the 96 bus into Davis/Harvard. Free laundry.  Email me for more info/pictures.

Name: Yuki Zaninovich
Details: Great location that's close to uphill dorms, carm and pizza days (you can see them from the window). massive living room, parking included, all the good stuff. Message me if you're interested or want to take a look at pictures / get a tour!

Name: Sabrina Manero
Details: One large room with lots of natural light available for subletting in a four person apartment across from the rainbow steps. Really convenient location as it's across the street from Tufts campus; next to the 80, 94, and 96 bus route stops; and a ten minute walk to Davis Square. Great living room, kitchen, and basement area, and has its own washer and dryer. Also has one parking spot available! Please message or email me (sabrina.manero@tufts.edu) with any questions or if you would like to see pictures!

Name: Grace Polakoski
Contact Info: grace.polakoski@tufts.edu, or find me on fb!
Details: 1 bedroom in 2 bedroom house. Room will be furnished. 5 minute walk to gym and 5 minutes to Oasis. Amazing kitchen with a *pantry*. Washer and dryer in the basement. 1 parking space.

Name: Prudence Sax
Details: 1 room, fully furnished, perfect location. email for more info/photos

Name: Ki Ki Chan
Details: 1 Huge room close to the Gym, In front of Dunkins and Tamper. What more do you need?? Incredible people too.

Name: Catherine Gao
Details: Perfect for research/jobs at 200 Boston Ave; close to DPH, Tamper, Whole Foods, lots of good food; at least 3 rooms available, 2 porches, beautiful kitchen and living room, backyard, washer and dryer are free, dishwasher, gas stove

Name: Ben Kaplan
Details:
-Full Kitchen and bath

Name: Dafni Frohman
Details: 3 rooms available, basic furniture provided. Available June 1 - August 31. Two bathrooms (full ones), hardwood floors, nice living room and kitchen, wifi, and a porch. Rent doesn't include utilities, but that'll be around 20 dollars per month per person. Parking available. Landlord is super responsive and helpful!

Name: Ashley Miller

Name: Shana Merrifield
